name: Garuda
description:
This is a game I made in Construct 2.
It references the Hindu tale of Garuda, how he has to save his mom from a big snake called a Naga. The Naga demands we fly up into heaven and bring Amrita back so he could turn immortal. In the end Garuda meets Vishnu who tells him he can just trick the Naga into trading the Amrita for his mom but then make the Amrita disappear back to heaven. 
The Naga then gets mad and chases Garuda. I made it into a 2d platformer.
